name: Zumba Fitness 2
description:
Zumba Fitness 2 amps up the dance fitness party with loads of new features and improvements, including all new routines, hit music, fresh dance styles, dynamic new venues, customization and much more. Get your body rockin' with a fun, effective program that makes you forget you're even exercising!

Features

• Get a total body workout with 32 exhilarating new routines including hot music tracks from Pitbull and Nicole Scherzinger
• Learn 24 different dance styles
• Follow along as Zumba instructor fan favorites Tanya Beardsley, Gina Grant and Zumba’s creator, Beto guide you through each exercise
• Get your party on in 5 dynamic environments
• Dance hands-free with the included Zumba Fitness belt
• Monitor calories burned with the new Calorie Tracker
